headline.print_headline: Brazil Police Arrest Last Suspect in Olympics Terrorism Case
headline.main: Brazil Police Arrest Last Suspect in Olympics Terrorism Case

snippet: Police arrested the last suspect wanted so far in a case of Brazilian sympathizers of the Islamic State who allegedly discussed attacking the Olympic Games next month in Rio de Janeiro....
lead_paragraph: Police arrested the last suspect wanted so far in a case of Brazilian sympathizers of the Islamic State who allegedly discussed attacking the Olympic Games next month in Rio de Janeiro.

headline.print_headline: Islamic State Suspect Faces Terrorism Charges in Germany
headline.main: Islamic State Suspect Faces Terrorism Charges in Germany

snippet: German prosecutors say they've charged a 30-year-old man with membership in the Islamic State group, alleging that he fought with the group in Syria in 2013....
lead_paragraph: German prosecutors say they've charged a 30-year-old man with membership in the Islamic State group, alleging that he fought with the group in Syria in 2013.

headline.print_headline: House Backs Bill to Use Testimonials to Combat Terrorism
headline.main: House Backs Bill to Use Testimonials to Combat Terrorism

snippet: The House passed a bill Tuesday requiring the Department of Homeland Security to use testimonials from former extremists and other social media messages to combat "Hollywood-style propaganda" used by the Islamic State and other militant groups to ...
lead_paragraph: The House passed a bill Tuesday requiring the Department of Homeland Security to use testimonials from former extremists and other social media messages to combat "Hollywood-style propaganda" used by the Islamic State and other militant groups to recruit new members.

headline.print_headline: Syria Says Ready to Cooperate With U.S. Against Terrorism
headline.main: Syria Says Ready to Cooperate With U.S. Against Terrorism

snippet: Syria is willing to take part in an international coalition against terrorism but only if the United States will work with Damascus in a way it has not done so far, the Syrian envoy to Geneva peace talks said on Monday....
lead_paragraph: Syria is willing to take part in an international coalition against terrorism but only if the United States will work with Damascus in a way it has not done so far, the Syrian envoy to Geneva peace talks said on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Kerry Says Belgium Government Acted Forcefully to Tackle Terrorism
headline.main: Kerry Says Belgium Government Acted Forcefully to Tackle Terrorism

snippet: U.S. Secretary of State John Kerry, dismissing criticism of Belgium's failure to track Islamic State militants, said on Friday the Belgian government had acted forcefully to fight terrorism before Tuesday's bombings....
lead_paragraph: U.S. Secretary of State John Kerry, dismissing criticism of Belgium's failure to track Islamic State militants, said on Friday the Belgian government had acted forcefully to fight terrorism before Tuesday's bombings.

headline.print_headline: Brexit Would Make UK Counter-Terrorism Job Harder: Europol
headline.main: Brexit Would Make UK Counter-Terrorism Job Harder: Europol

snippet: British police would find it harder to protect citizens from militant attacks and organised crime if it left the European Union, the head of Europol said on Monday, countering a claim to the contrary by a leading British euroskeptic....
lead_paragraph: British police would find it harder to protect citizens from militant attacks and organised crime if it left the European Union, the head of Europol said on Monday, countering a claim to the contrary by a leading British euroskeptic.

headline.print_headline: China Says Terrorism, Fake News Impel Greater Global Internet Curbs
headline.main: China Says Terrorism, Fake News Impel Greater Global Internet Curbs

snippet: China's ambitions to tighten up regulation of the Internet have found a second wind in old fears - terrorism and fake news....
lead_paragraph: China's ambitions to tighten up regulation of the Internet have found a second wind in old fears - terrorism and fake news.

headline.print_headline: Belgium Freezes Assets of 15 People Linked to Terrorism
headline.main: Belgium Freezes Assets of 15 People Linked to Terrorism

snippet: Belgium has frozen the assets of 15 people allegedly linked to terrorism, including a Belgian man identified as being a possible organizer of the deadly attacks on Paris and Brussels....
lead_paragraph: Belgium has frozen the assets of 15 people allegedly linked to terrorism, including a Belgian man identified as being a possible organizer of the deadly attacks on Paris and Brussels.

headline.print_headline: India's Prime Minister Says Pakistan a Haven for Terrorism
headline.main: India's Prime Minister Says Pakistan a Haven for Terrorism

snippet: India's prime minister said Saturday that he would work to isolate Pakistan internationally, accusing his country's archrival of trying to destabilize Asia by exporting terrorism....
lead_paragraph: India's prime minister said Saturday that he would work to isolate Pakistan internationally, accusing his country's archrival of trying to destabilize Asia by exporting terrorism.

headline.print_headline: Vital That Pakistan Joins Fight Against Terrorism, Kerry Says
headline.main: Vital That Pakistan Joins Fight Against Terrorism, Kerry Says

snippet: Pakistan needs to join other nations in fighting terrorism, U.S. Secretary of State John Kerry urged on Tuesday, saying Islamabad should not feel isolated by planned trilateral talks between the United States, India and Afghanistan....
lead_paragraph: Pakistan needs to join other nations in fighting terrorism, U.S. Secretary of State John Kerry urged on Tuesday, saying Islamabad should not feel isolated by planned trilateral talks between the United States, India and Afghanistan.
